H0.text: Predators are organisms that break down and recycle dead plants and animals.

H1.text: Prey are organisms that break down and recycle dead plants and animals.

H2.text: Decomposers break down and recycle dead plants and animals.

H3.text: Producers are organisms that break down and recycle dead plants and animals.

A4.text: Decomposers are organisms that break down dead organisms and release the nutrients from the dead matter into the environment around them.
